SEARCH

Class BASIC

java.lang.Object
BASIC
public class BASIC extends Object
The BASIC (Bed And breakfaSt In Cyprus) application class. This class provides the command-line interface for managing users, properties, and bookings within a bed and breakfast system.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    ArrayList<Property>
    properties

    users

  • Method Details

    • menu

      public void menu()
      Starts the main menu loop of the application.

    • exit

      public void exit()
      Ends the application and exits the program.

    • addUser

      public void addUser()
      Adds a new user to the list of users in the application. Prompts the user for user information, including User ID, type, first name, last name, date of birth, and registration date. Validates input and checks for duplicate User IDs before adding the user. The user type determines whether a Host, Standard Customer, or Gold Customer is created.
      Throws:
      InputMismatchException - if the input format is incorrect.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(int userId)
      Deletes a user from the BASIC system based on the user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique ID of the user to be deleted.

    • getUserDetails

      public void getUserDetails(int userId)
      Retrieves and displays the details of a user given their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The unique ID of the user whose details are to be displayed.

    • getPropertyDetails

      public void getPropertyDetails(int propertyId)
      Displays the details of a property given its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      propertyId - The unique ID of the property whose details are to be displayed.

    • addProperty

      public void addProperty()
      Adds a new property to the list of properties in the application. Prompts the user for property information, including Property ID, type, number of bedrooms, number of rooms, city, price per day, and the host's user ID. Validates input and checks for duplicate Property IDs before adding the property. The property type determines whether a SharedProperty or FullProperty is created.
      Throws:
      InputMismatchException - if the input format is incorrect.

    • deleteProperty

      public void deleteProperty(int propertyId)
      Deletes a property from the BASIC system based on the property ID.
      Parameters:
      propertyId - The unique ID of the property to be deleted.

    • addBooking

      public void addBooking()

    • getBookingCost

      public void getBookingCost(int userId, int propertyId)
      Calculates and displays the cost of a booking for a given user ID and property ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user who made the booking.
      propertyId - The ID of the property that was booked.

    • getUserBooking

      public void getUserBooking(int userId)
      Retrieves and displays the bookings for a given user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose bookings are to be displayed.

    • listUsers

      Lists all the users registered in the BASIC system.
